statements: UPDATE AnimalMovements SET movement_type='Walking' WHERE animal_id=1;
UPDATE AnimalMovements SET to_location='Forest' WHERE animal_id=2;
UPDATE AnimalMovements SET movement_type='Walk', to_location='Forest' WHERE animal_id=1 AND timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00'
UPDATE AnimalMovements SET from_location='Zoo', to_location='Jungle', timestamp='2022-02-20 15:45:00' WHERE animal_id=2
UPDATE Animal SET last_seen = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE animal_id = 1;
UPDATE Location SET facility_area = 500.75, facility_type = 'Zoo' WHERE location_id = 3;
UPDATE Animal SET species='Lion', location_id=3 WHERE animal_id=7;
UPDATE Location SET facility_type='Zoo', facility_area=1500.25 WHERE location_id=5;
UPDATE Animal SET arrival_time = '2022-04-01 08:00:00', departure_time = '2022-04-02 15:30:00' WHERE animal_id = 1;
UPDATE Facility SET location = 'New Location' WHERE facility_id = 3;
UPDATE Animal SET facility_id = 2, departure_time = '2022-08-15 12:00:00' WHERE animal_id = 5;
UPDATE Facility SET location = 'New Location', facility_name = 'New Facility Name' WHERE facility_id = 3;
UPDATE animal_movement SET location = 'Forest', movement_time = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE animal_id = 101;
UPDATE location_tracking SET entry_time = '2022-01-21 08:45:00', location = 'River' WHERE tracking_id = 201;
UPDATE animal_movement SET location = 'Forest' WHERE animal_id = 101;
UPDATE facility_zone SET zone_name = 'Savanna' WHERE zone_id = 201;
UPDATE Animal SET age = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Movement SET to_location = 'Zoo' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Animal SET age = age + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Movement SET from_location = 'Main Zoo' WHERE movement_date < '2022-01-01';
